CustomField.description: Checked if the Subscription is suspended. Subscriptions can be suspended to prevent automatic payment via Payment Method on file or to revoke benefits (Badges, etc...) granted by the Subscription Item.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if the Subscription is suspended. Subscriptions can be suspended to prevent automatic payment via Payment Method on file or to revoke benefits (Badges, etc...) granted by the Subscription Item.
CustomField.label: Is Suspended
